Function to read data:

```{r}
readData <- function(file){
    data <- read.csv(file,
                     header=TRUE,
                     na.strings = c("NA", ""),
                     stringsAsFactors=FALSE,
                     sep=",")
    data
    }
```

Function to clean data:

```{r}
cleanData <- function(df){
    df <- df[,-1]
    df[is.na(df)] <- 0
    df$cvtd_timestamp <- strptime(df$cvtd_timestamp, "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M")
    df$weekday <- weekdays(df$cvtd_timestamp)
    df$month <- months(df$cvtd_timestamp)
    df$time <- format.Date(df$cvtd_timestamp, format="%H")
    df$ampm <- format.Date(df$cvtd_timestamp, format="%p")
    df
    }
```

Read training data:

```{r}
training <- readData("./data/training.csv")
```

Clean data:

```{r}
training <- cleanData(training)
```
